rules_text:
First strike, mentor
[i]Heroic[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fei, Lunar Lancer, put a +1/+1 counter on it, and you may phase it out.
Other creatures you control with a counter on them have “{W}{U}: This creature phases out.” [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
